charaepi_ch0244_90_hop/2301_1101_0100_20:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] was training with
Hop, and they kept going until they were
completely exhausted.
charaepi_ch0244_90_hop/2301_1201_0200_10:
Phew, I sure worked up a sweat! It really got
me fired up!
charaepi_ch0244_90_hop/2301_1201_0300_10:
You and your Pokémon all fought hard. Good
effort out there!
charaepi_ch0244_90_hop/2301_1201_0400_10:
Made me almost want to let out Charizard and
join in on all the fun!
charaepi_ch0244_90_hop/2301_0301_0600_10: It doesn’t look tired at all!
charaepi_ch0244_90_hop/2301_0401_0700_10:
Yeah! It’s so full of energy, even I struggle to
keep up!
charaepi_ch0244_90_hop/2301_0402_0900_10: It may be just a warm-up for this one.
charaepi_ch0244_90_hop/2301_1201_1000_10:
Ever since we met, I don’t think I’ve seen it
get tired.
charaepi_ch0244_90_hop/2301_1201_1200_10: Well, let me tell you how our legend began!
charaepi_ch0244_90_hop/2301_1201_1300_10:
I met Zapdos when I was exploring the Wild Area
in Galar.
charaepi_ch0244_90_hop/2301_1201_1500_10:
When it saw my Zamazenta, instead of backing
down...
charaepi_ch0244_90_hop/2301_1201_1600_10: it charged straight at us without any fear!
charaepi_ch0244_90_hop/2301_1201_1700_10:
But when I tried to catch it, it ran away at an
incredible speed, and it was so hard to catch
up to.
charaepi_ch0244_90_hop/2301_1201_1800_10: Hahaha! That sounds like a lot of work!
charaepi_ch0244_90_hop/2301_1201_1900_10: It’s been a lot of work ever since we teamed up.
charaepi_ch0244_90_hop/2301_1201_2000_10:
Zapdos’s combativeness hasn’t changed!
It’ll challenge anyone to a battle!
charaepi_ch0244_90_hop/2301_1201_2100_10:
The reason I asked [Name:PlayerNickname ] to
train with me is...
charaepi_ch0244_90_hop/2301_1201_2200_10:
I wanted to sharpen my skills, so I’d be ready to
battle anyone at any time.
charaepi_ch0244_90_hop/2301_1201_2300_10:
It’s actually really nice being with Zapdos,
because it’s so decisive!
charaepi_ch0244_90_hop/2301_1201_2400_10:
You must be battling a lot more since you
partnered up with Zapdos, right?
charaepi_ch0244_90_hop/2301_1201_2500_10:
I feel like your skills have improved. That’s
probably why!
charaepi_ch0244_90_hop/2301_1201_2600_10:
Really?! If that’s so, meeting Zapdos has brought
me so many good things!
charaepi_ch0244_90_hop/2301_1201_2700_10:
Speaking of which! Here on Pasio, I had an
opportunity to learn about Zapdos from a
different region.
charaepi_ch0244_90_hop/2301_1201_2800_10:
It uses Electric-type moves and is good at flying.
It’s completely different from Galarian Zapdos!
charaepi_ch0244_90_hop/2301_1201_3100_10:
My goal is to be a Pokémon Professor, but I still
wanna battle together with different Pokémon!
charaepi_ch0244_90_hop/2301_0401_3300_10:
Of course! There’s still loads I want you to teach
me, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
charaepi_ch0244_90_hop/2301_0402_3500_10:
That’s right! Since I’ve made it to Pasio, I wanna
do so many things!
charaepi_ch0244_90_hop/2301_1201_3700_10:
When me and Zapdos get even stronger
than we are now...
charaepi_ch0244_90_hop/2301_1201_3800_10: Of course! I’ll take you on!
charaepi_ch0244_90_hop/2301_1201_3900_10: Thanks, Lee! I’ll consider that a promise!
